events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated in days, and I am worried that my package is lost.
System categorized the issue as a delivery delay based on customer's mention of late shipping and stagnant tracking information.
An agent specialized in delivery issues has been assigned to handle the customer's case for prompt assistance.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear your order hasn't arrived yet. I'll do my best to help you track it down.
Could you please provide me with your order number and the shipping address so I can look into the details for you?
Sure, my order number is #123456789 and the shipping address is 456 Maple Drive, Springfield.
Thank you for the details. I have contacted the courier and they confirmed a delay due to weather conditions. Your package is expected to arrive within the next three days.
I appreciate the update. It's not ideal, but at least I know what is going on now. I will wait for the delivery.
We are marking this issue as resolved since your package is now out for delivery and should reach you shortly.
Hi again! Just following up to ensure your package arrived safely and you are satisfied with the delivery resolution.
Yes, I received the package yesterday and everything is in perfect condition. Thank you for your help!
We are closing this case now. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any further issues.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. Your feedback is appreciated.
